rules_text:
Apocryphal Offering can't be countered.
Put six 1/1 red Human creature tokens named Cultist onto the battlefield tapped, then put three 5/5 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens named Idol onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: [i]They abandoned their lives and their loved ones, setting up camp in the treacherous desert and tirelessly building idols for the Overseer, praying one day it would notice.[/i]
